speaker: VERA
text: Incoming threat detected. Stand by for tactical options.

speaker: STONE
text: Too many bogeys passing us. Focus your fire, Lieutenant!

speaker: SPARKS
text: You bring this crate back in one piece, I might even be nice to it.

speaker: RAZOR
text: Try not to shoot the friendlies this time, Rider.

speaker: STONE
text: Convoy Omega is all we've got left. You lose it, we lose the war.

speaker: VERA
text: Holding course. Expect heavy intercept in your lane.

speaker: VERA
text: Evading. You'll be alone out front for a few seconds.

speaker: SPARKS
text: Minimal scorch marks. I can work with this.

speaker: SPARKS
text: Next time you want vent art, ask before you shred the hull.

speaker: STONE
text: Convoy's gone. Pack it in, Salamander Wing. We're done here.
